Name: PostOutlineArea
Notes: An area that renders a thick outline around some edges while the player is inside of it.

Obj_arg0.Name: Intensity
Obj_arg0.Description: Thickness and intensity of the outlines. Ranges from 0 to 255.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
